name: milo
title: Milo
desc: Milo is a clean and modern resume template for Astro, built with Tailwind CSS, perfect for showcasing your professional profile online.
article:
Milo is an elegant and production-ready resume template built with Astro and Tailwind CSS. Designed for developers, designers, and creatives, Milo offers a clean, modern way to showcase your skills, experience, and projects â all in a beautifully structured, single-page layout. Itâs fully responsive, developer-friendly, and optimized, making it ideal for digital portfolios.

Looking for something more advanced?

Check out Foxi Pro, a premium Astro template packed with advanced features like multilingual support, CMS integration, mega menu, animation, and more â ideal for larger-scale projects and production websites.

View Foxi Pro | View Foxi Pro live Demo

Features

  • Resume-Centric Design: Includes structured sections for Profile, Experience, Education, Skills, Projects, and Contact.
  • Tailwind CSS Integration: Built with utility-first classes for fast, flexible development.
  • Responsive Design: Fully responsive across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
  • Light & Dark Mode: Toggle between themes based on user preference.
  • Prebuilt Sections: Professionally designed layout components ready to go.
  • Easy Content Management: Use JSON files to update your content with ease.
  • Integrated with Keystatic CMS: Leverage a powerful, headless CMS for easy content management and updates.
  • Smooth Animations: Enhance the experience with subtle transitions and page effects.
  • SEO Optimized: Built to be discoverable by search engines out of the box.
  • Clean Codebase: Well-organized and easy to extend or modify.
  • Modular Components: Easily reusable and customizable blocks and UI elements.
  • Analytics Ready: Supports Google Analytics and Tag Manager.
  • Sitemap XML Included: Helps with search engine indexing.
